hero.title: Compliant cookie banners & CMP, done right
hero.subtitle: We set up a Consent Management Platform, block trackers before consent, localize banners, and record consent properly. End‑to‑end.
hero.microcopy: No dark patterns. No pushy UX. No unnecessary scripts.

items.title: CMP Setup
items.text: Cookiebot, Iubenda, Usercentrics, Termly - your choice

items.text: Scan, classify, and map into CMP

items.text: EN, DE, FR and other languages

steps.title: Site Audit
steps.text: Inventory cookies/scripts and current banner behavior

steps.title: Technical Setup
steps.text: CMP code, GTM, blocking tags, consent events

deliverables.title: What you get
items: Fully configured CMP with proper categories and auto-blocking
Scan report (before/after), tag & cookie list by category
Maintenance guide (how to add new scripts without breaking compliance)

items.title: End-to-end
items.text: Copy + tech + testing in one package

cards.after: Accept/Decline/Preferences; strict pre-consent blocking; improved banner conversion; consent reports available

cards.before: Third-party cookies before consent; no Preference Center
cards.after: Auto-blocking of trackers; Preference Center + footer manager; FR/EN localization
Unified CMP; consistent categories; centralized consent logging

pricing.title: Plans & Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the right package for your needs

plans.name: Pro
plans.description: CMP setup + GTM integration + scan/report + policy pages

plans.name: Business
plans.description: Multi-domain/launchers, migration, custom events, white-label report

pricing.note: Pricing & timelines depend on stack, traffic, and regions. Contact us for a custom quote.

items.question: How is a CMP different from a simple banner?
items.answer: A CMP records lawful consent per category and controls script loading via consent events; a simple banner won't ensure proper pre-consent blocking.

items.question: Can we keep our current banner design?
items.answer: Yes, we adapt CMP widgets to your brand guidelines while ensuring compliance.

items.question: Do you support GPC / Do Not Sell?
items.answer: Where supported by the selected CMP and jurisdiction requirements.

items.question: Is this legal advice?
items.answer: We provide technical implementation and policy templates. Legal review remains with your DPO/legal counsel.

items.question: How long does implementation take?
items.answer: Basic fixes: 1-2 weeks. Full CMP setup: 2-4 weeks. Complex migrations: 4-6 weeks.
